meanings.sent1: The road was dark and asphaltic, like a giant black ribbon stretching into the distance.
meanings.sent2: The driveway was smooth and asphaltic, perfect for riding bikes.
meanings.sent3: The asphaltic cookies were so burnt they looked like little black rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an asphaltic quality, rough and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the asphaltic pavement after the rain was oddly comforting.

meanings.sent1: The parking lot was vast and asphaltic, with lines marking each space clearly.
meanings.sent2: The street was busy, with cars driving on the asphaltic surface all day long.
meanings.sent3: The asphaltic playground was a hit with the kids, who loved the smooth surface for running.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like an asphaltic road, cold and unyielding to any emotion.
meanings.sent5: The asphaltic driveway gleamed in the sunlight, a perfect welcome to the home.
